headline: Cruz Joins McCormick in US Senate Appearance
author: Tory Gates
sentences:

WHLM/WBWX FCC Applications
A former hedge fund manager and US Senate candidate with ties to Bloomsburg will be in the Lehigh Valley Tuesday to campaign.
Dave McCormick will be joined in Coplay for a rally by Texas Republican Senator Ted Cruz, who has endorsed McCormick.
The younger McCormick is in a crowded field of candidates who wish to replace outgoing Senator Pat Toomey.
McCormick grew up in Bloomsburg; his father, James McCormick served as Bloomsburg University president.
